scripts.title: On Deployment Webhook Function

steps.description: Open the onDeploymentWebhook source file in the repo viewer.
Scroll through the file to show the webhook logic.

voiceover: This video walks through the onDeploymentWebhook Cloud Function, which is triggered after each deployment to start the documentation pipeline.
First we open the source file in the repository viewer, then we scroll to see how the function extracts deployment data and forwards it to the training video generator.

scripts.title: Scheduled Documentation Review

steps.description: Open the scheduledDocReview function source file.
Scroll to show the daily review logic.

voiceover: The scheduledDocReview function runs daily to check for pending documentation updates.
It scans Firestore for any changes that need new training material and triggers the generator when needed.

scripts.title: PDF Fixer Service

steps.description: Open the PDF Fixer service source file.
Scroll through the code that processes PDF fixes.

voiceover: The PDF Fixer service receives a PDF, applies selected fixes, and returns the corrected file.
This video demonstrates the service’s API endpoint and the internal processing steps.

scripts.title: Email Notification Service

steps.description: Open the email notification service source file.
Scroll to show email composition and sending logic.

voiceover: This service builds and sends email notifications to users when a job completes.
We walk through the template rendering and the call to the email provider API.

scripts.title: Auto‑Documentation Orchestrator

steps.description: Open the auto‑documentation orchestrator source file.
Scroll through the webhook and scheduler setup.

voiceover: The auto‑documentation system ties together change detection, content generation, and training updates.
This video shows how the webhook triggers the pipeline and how the scheduled review runs daily.
